rows.text: Which of these soils will be easier to dig and allow roots to penetrate more easily? The one on the left!
subtext_list: Healthy soils that are rich in organic matter have a lot of space in them for air and water.
They have water stable aggregates (see next slide)
Seeds emerge through these soils without problems of crusting and roots grow unimpeded. The soils are very easy to dig compared to the compacted one on the right.
Seeds emerge through these soils without problems of crusting and roots grow unimpeded. The soils are very easy to dig compared to the compacted one on the right.
